sentences.sCn: 德国于 1945 年 5 月 7 日投降。

sentences.sContent: The terrorists were given ten minutes to surrender.
sentences.sCn: 恐怖分子被限定在十分钟之内投降。

remMethod.val: sur(在…下面) + render(递交) → 把放在下面的东西交上去 → 投降； 放弃

trans.tranOther: to say officially that you want to stop fighting, because you realize that you cannot win

trans.tranCn: 投降； 屈服， 屈从； 放弃
trans.tranOther: when you say officially that you want to stop fighting because you realize that you cannot win
